comment: Curious - you boiled 29l down to 20, but 17 went in the fermenter.  Is that the loss in your boil kettle after whirlpooling that colossus load of hops? ;)
Yup, it's a hoppy beast, and they stole some. I was also a bit conservative with leaving trub in boiler as been having a few issues with cloudy beers.
